items.name: Soda
items.description: Two month old soda from that time you hosted someone's birthday party.

items.name: Bread
items.description: Wait why is there bread in the fridge? Well at least it's fresh.

items.name: Cheese
items.description: Does the blue mold on this mean it's cultured?

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: You've only just now realized Monstera Energy is meant for plants and says 'Not For Human Consumption'.

items.name: Ramen Noodles
items.description: Leftovers from last week. There is a 33.333% chance you'll ever touch this again.
